page.title: 13CHILDREN IN LONGNEWTON
page.content: THE MAIN PASTIME FOR THE YOUNGER CHILDREN OF THE VILLAGE IS PLAYING ON THEIR{BIKES.}AS THERE ARE NUMEROUS GREEN AREAS IN THE VILLAGE,{FOOTBALL IS A POPULAR GAME FOR THE BOYS.THE GIRLS PREFER EITHER{SKIPPING}OR {ROLLER-SKATING.}MOST OF THE CHILDREN HAVE EITHER A SWING OR A CLIMBING FRAME. THE MAIN{INDOOR ACTIVITIES}FOR THE CHILDREN IS WATCHING THE TELEVISION. THE BOYS ALSO PLAY WITH{"STAR-WARS" {FIGURES}AND THE GIRLS WITH {"CARE-BEARS"}AND{"MY LITTLE PONY". ORGANISED EVENTS FOR THESE CHILDREN ARE THE VILLAGE SHOW,BADMINTON AND DISCO'S. MANY ARE IN CLUBS FOR SWIMMING, DANCING,ICE-SKATING,JUDO AND GYMNASTICS BUT THEY HAVE TO GO{OUTSIDE {THE VILLAGE}FOR THESE.
